Key:
All right. I think I'll go to the cafeteria
today.
Oh, Itsuka-kun. Do you always eat lunch here?
No. I don't come here often.

I see. I happened to stop by today, I hadn't
realized how many students eat lunch here.
Well, it's cheap, and it holds a lot of people.

To be honest, at our staff meeting today, we
discussed getting rid of the cafeteria and just
letting the school shop remain.
What, really? I wouldn't want that.

There are plenty of students who stick around
to chat even after they've finished eating.

Very true. Many students would be disappointed
if it were to be removed.

I think so. Places like this are what make a
school a school.

Yes, indeed. Then I will oppose the removal.
I will communicate this with the other teachers.

(She's a great teacher who really listens to
the concerns of her students.)
